text: The Axe is a 2005 Belgian French Spanish drama movie directed by Costa-Gavras and was based on the 1997 novel of the same name by Donald E. Westlake. It stars Jos√© Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Monfils, Christa Theret, Ulrich Tukur, Olivier Gourmet, Thierry Hancisse. ==Other websites== * Category:2005 drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Costa-Gavras
title: The Axe (movie)
